name: Synapsia
description:
DESCRIPTION

Synapsia is a first-person escape-room game made of five different levels (or rooms). The main feature of the game is that it's set in the protagonist's mind, which is in a pre-mortem status: throughout the game, the player understands how the character ended up in this situation. Have fun and discover what happened!

HOW TO PLAY

In each room you'll have to solve different puzzles or mini action games to unlock the door and "jump" to the next level.  Some mini-games are hidden and not necessary to go on in the game, it's up to you to find them! 

The standard commands to play are explained in the 'Option' menu and the special commands are shown in the 2D GUI when needed during the game.

The game is currently available only in Italian, but soon English subtitles will be provided.

CREATORS

This game was developed for the "Realtà Virtuale" course of Politecnico di Torino, by Francesco Calì, Arianna D'Alessandro, Giorgia Marullo, Pietro Pingitore and Adalgisa Rabino.
